net.majorkernelpanic.streaming

Interface Session.Callback

  • Enclosing class:
    Session

    public static interface Session.Callback
    The callback interface you need to implement to get some feedback Those will be called from the UI thread.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBitrareUpdate(long bitrate)
      Called periodically to inform you on the bandwidth consumption of the streams when streaming.
      void onPreviewStarted()
      Called when the previw of the VideoStream has correctly been started.
      void onSessionConfigured()
      Called when the session has correctly been configured after calling Session.configure().
      void onSessionError(int reason, int streamType, java.lang.Exception e)
      Called when some error occurs.
      void onSessionStarted()
      Called when the streams of the session have correctly been started.
      void onSessionStopped()
      Called when the stream of the session have been stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • onBitrareUpdate

        void onBitrareUpdate(long bitrate)
        Called periodically to inform you on the bandwidth consumption of the streams when streaming.

      • onSessionError

        void onSessionError(int reason,
                  int streamType,
                  java.lang.Exception e)
        Called when some error occurs.

      • onPreviewStarted

        void onPreviewStarted()
        Called when the previw of the VideoStream has correctly been started. If an error occurs while starting the preview, onSessionError(int, int, Exception) will be called instead of onPreviewStarted().

      • onSessionConfigured

        void onSessionConfigured()
        Called when the session has correctly been configured after calling Session.configure(). If an error occurs while configuring the Session, onSessionError(int, int, Exception) will be called instead of onSessionConfigured().

      • onSessionStarted

        void onSessionStarted()
        Called when the streams of the session have correctly been started. If an error occurs while starting the Session, onSessionError(int, int, Exception) will be called instead of onSessionStarted().

      • onSessionStopped

        void onSessionStopped()
        Called when the stream of the session have been stopped.
